Summary: Very bright white light followed by another very bright white light
divs: sighting detailsi was approximately 1\4 north of the george washington bridge taking photos, when i noticed a very bright white light followed by another very bright light moving from west to east. they flew directly overhead, and were flying at about 2,000 feet, and moving very slowly, and made absolutely no sound. there were other people present who i do not know who noticed these 2 objects as well. one person even yelled "check those 2 lights out". at which point just about everyone looked up. we all watched the 2 objects for about 2 minutes until they disappeared. there were small aircraft flying along the hudson river that must have noticed them, as well as a helicopter. this is an identical sighting i had and reported on 9\9\09, while walking my dog.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fort Lee
There were no other sightings in Fort Lee on or around November 26th 2009
